heading: news site for phantom phans
subheading: zap corp. launches a site to cover all the news that's fit to print ... about star wars episode i: the phantom menace, anyway.
author: wired news report
text: the fatally under-publicized star wars prequel received a boost friday from zap corp., the internet subsidiary of texas fish-meal maker zapata.zap said that it will launch www.phantommenacenews.com to provide fans with links to star wars-related news, commentary, and events information.zap ceo avram glaser said in a statement that he hoped to capitalize on all the net mania surrounding the movie's release."[the phantom menace] is one of the most eagerly awaited films of all time. star wars fans around the world are eager for up-to-the-minute information ... and phantommenacenews.com will help to provide it."the site will also count down the days until the film's 19 may release.
